1: [a]The Lord reigns; he is robed in majesty; the Lord is robed, he is girded with strength. Yea, the world is established; it shall never be moved;
2: thy throne is established from of old; thou art from everlasting.
3: The floods have lifted up, O Lord, the floods have lifted up their voice, the floods lift up their roaring.
4: Mightier than the thunders of many waters, mightier than the waves[b] of the sea, the Lord on high is mighty!
5: Thy decrees are very sure; holiness befits thy house, O Lord, for evermore.
